description: NEW EXISTENCE AND RIGHTEOUS LIVING IN COLOSSIANS AND 1 PETER IN CONVERSATION WITH 4QINSTRUCTION AND THE HODAYOT. Doctoral thesis, Durham University. CHRYSOVERGI, MARIA (2011) Attitudes towards the Use of Medicine in Jewish Literature from the Third and Second Centuries BCE.
title: NEW EXISTENCE AND RIGHTEOUS LIVING IN COLOSSIANS AND 1 PETER IN CONVERSATION WITH 4QINSTRUCTION AND THE HODAYOT
